title: Output Schema for updateMany Operation
description: Output schema for the updateMany operation in the connector.

payload.description: The main response payload from the updateMany operation.

upsertedId.description: The ID of the upserted document if an upsert occurred, typically a BsonObjectId value

modifiedCount.description: The number of documents that were modified by the update operation

matchedCount.description: The number of documents that matched the filter criteria
